    • Method Detail

      • minimumMatch

        public TermsQueryBuilder minimumMatch(int minimumMatch)
        Sets the minimum number of matches across the provided terms. Defaults to 1.

      • minimumShouldMatch

        public TermsQueryBuilder minimumShouldMatch(String minimumShouldMatch)

      • boost

        public TermsQueryBuilder boost(float boost)
        Sets the boost for this query. Documents matching this query will (in addition to the normal weightings) have their score multiplied by the boost provided.
        Specified by:
        boost in interface BoostableQueryBuilder<TermsQueryBuilder>

      • disableCoord

        public TermsQueryBuilder disableCoord(boolean disableCoord)
        Disables Similarity#coord(int,int) in scoring. Defualts to false.

      • queryName

        public TermsQueryBuilder queryName(String queryName)
        Sets the query name for the filter that can be used when searching for matched_filters per hit.
